text:
e="preserve">Alfie Curtis (born 28 July 1930, died 30 November 2017) was a British actor. He was best known for the minor role as Dr. Evazan in ' (1977) whose line: "I have the death sentence on twelve systems" led the franchise's first use of a lightsaber in combat. He was also in "The Elephant Man" and "Take It or Leave It". He was born in London.
Curtis died on 30 November 2017 in Billericay, Essex at the age of 87.
